RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Link to ZTF light curve for ztf_dr5 collection

PARAM.name: bad_catflags_mask
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Bitmask used to exclude lightcurve points with at least one of the indicated catflag bits set. Default is 0.

PARAM.name: time
PARAM.DESCRIPTION: Date-time range for which lightcurve data is to be retrieved, unlimited by default. Space-separated range endpoint(s) are interpreted as Modified Julian Dates (MJD).

FIELD.name: cntr
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique row identifier

FIELD.name: oid
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique object identifier

FIELD.name: ra
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Object Right Ascension

FIELD.name: dec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Object Declination

FIELD.name: htm20
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: HTM20 index for object

FIELD.name: field
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Field identifier

FIELD.name: ccdid
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: CCD identifier (1-16)

FIELD.name: qid
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Quadrant (1-4)

FIELD.name: fid
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Filter identifier (1 = zg; 2 = zr; 3 = zi)

FIELD.name: filtercode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Filter code (zg, zr, zi)

FIELD.name: x
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unit sphere position x-coordinate

FIELD.name: y
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unit sphere position y-coordinate

FIELD.name: z
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unit sphere position z-coordinate

FIELD.name: ngoodobs
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of epochal detections that were not flagged or masked due to bad pixels

FIELD.name: ngoodobsrel
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of epochal detections in this release not associated with bad pixels

FIELD.name: nobs
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of epochal detections (observation epochs) in the lightcurve

FIELD.name: nobsrel
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of epochal detections that are in this release

FIELD.name: refchi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Ratio of observed to expected pixel-to-pixel scatter of the image profile

FIELD.name: refmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Object magnitude from reference image if detected (not transient)

FIELD.name: refmagerr
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Error in refMag

FIELD.name: refsharp
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Measure of the difference between observed and expected angular sizes

FIELD.name: refsnr
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: From the reference image catalog, signal-to-noise ratio

FIELD.name: astrometricrms
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Root Mean Squared deviation in epochal positions relative to object RA,Dec

FIELD.name: chisq
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Chi-square metric using nobs detections

FIELD.name: con
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Fraction of nobs where three consecutive epochs are > 2x RMS from median mag + 1

FIELD.name: lineartrend
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Slope from linear fit to nobs detections

FIELD.name: magrms
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Root Mean Squared deviation over nobs magnitudes

FIELD.name: maxmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum magnitude over nobs detections

FIELD.name: maxslope
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum pairwise slope over all consecutive nobs detections

FIELD.name: meanmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Mean magnitude over nobs detections

FIELD.name: medianabsdev
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Median absolute deviation in magnitudes over nobs detections

FIELD.name: medianmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Median magnitude over nobs detections

FIELD.name: medmagerr
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Median of magerr values over nobs detections

FIELD.name: minmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Minimum magnitude over nobs detections

FIELD.name: nabovemeanbystd_1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 1 standard deviation above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nabovemeanbystd_3
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 3 standard deviations above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nabovemeanbystd_5
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 5 standard deviations above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nbelowmeanbystd_1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 1 standard deviation below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nbelowmeanbystd_3
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 3 standard deviations below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nbelowmeanbystd_5
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of lightcurve points that are 5 standard deviations below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecabovemeanbystd_1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 1 standard deviation above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecabovemeanbystd_3
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 3 standard deviations above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecabovemeanbystd_5
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 5 standard deviations above the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecbelowmeanbystd_1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 1 standard deviation below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecbelowmeanbystd_3
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 3 standard deviations below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecbelowmeanbystd_5
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consecutive points that are 5 standard deviations below the mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecfrommeanbystd_1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consec. points that are 1 standard deviation above or below mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecfrommeanbystd_3
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consec. points that are 3 standard deviations above or below mean mag

FIELD.name: nconsecfrommeanbystd_5
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of consec. points that are 5 standard deviations above or below mean mag

FIELD.name: nmedianbufferrange
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of points more than 20% of the LC amplitude from the weighted mean mag

FIELD.name: npairposslope
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of positive slopes between consecutive pairwise lightcurve points

FIELD.name: percentiles_05
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 5th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_10
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 10th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_175
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 17.5 percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_25
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 25th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_325
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 32.5 percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_40
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 40th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_60
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 60th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_675
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 67.5 percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_75
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 75th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_825
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 82.5 percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_90
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 90th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: percentiles_95
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: 95th percentile in magnitude over nobs

FIELD.name: skewness
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Skew (third moment) in lightcurve magnitudes over nobs

FIELD.name: smallkurtosis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Small sample Kurtosis (fourth moment) in lightcurve magnitudes over nobs

FIELD.name: stetsonj
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Stetson-J statistic for this filter only; measures degree of autocorrelation

FIELD.name: stetsonk
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Stetson-K statistic; proportional to the kurtosis of the magnitude distribution

FIELD.name: vonneumannratio
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Von Neumann Ratio statistic over nobs; measure of epoch-to-epoch variability

FIELD.name: weightedmagrms
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Root Mean Square magnitude over nobs using inverse-variance weighting

FIELD.name: weightedmeanmag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Inverse-variance weighted mean magnitude over nobs
